bibl.title: An Inconvenient Truth? P. Oxy. 18.2196 verso, the Apion Estate, and fiscalité in the Late Antique Oxyrhynchite. Avec résumé en anglais.

series.title: Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists
BASP

bibl.note: An earlier version of this paper was presented as part of the Late Antique Oxyrhynchus Panel at the XXV International Congress of Papyrology in Ann Arbor. - Part 1: Description and Preliminary Interpretation of the Text (P. Oxy. XVIII, 2196 recto and verso). - Part 2. Some Historiographical Observations.
